T02TD2213E:194a-1: a'a rya n'i l'a mbara dhara badzra pa'i ni s'a dha no pi ka t'i ka n'a ma /
T02TD2213E:194a-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel ba /
T02TD2213E:194a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2213E:194a-5: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo skems mdzad pa //
T02TD2213E:194a-6: mthu ldan bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2213E:194a-7: nyi zla lta bur 'gro don mdzad pa'i mchog /
T02TD2213E:194a-8: sman mchog rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2213E:194a-9: rang bzhin rig pa stong pa chen po dang //
T02TD2213E:194a-10: gnyug ma bde ba snying rje chen po dang //
T02TD2213E:194a-11: bde ba chen po mtha' 'bral rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2213E:194a-12: phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin 'bras bu dngos //
T02TD2213E:194a-13: de nyid thob pa'i lam ni yod dang med pa yi //
T02TD2213E:194a-14: phyag rgya bzhi po lam gyis grol ba'i //
T02TD2213E:194a-15: de bzhin stong ba'i rang bzhin chen po ni //
T02TD2213E:194a-16: stong pa bdag med lam gyis grol zhes gsungs //
T02TD2213E:194a-17: de bzhin tshogs lam sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang //
T02TD2213E:194a-18: mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam gyis ni //
T02TD2213E:194a-19: gnas ba'i ye shes byang chub ngo bo'i lam //
T02TD2213E:194a-20: thob cing grol bar kha cig de skad gsung //
T02TD2213E:194a-21: da ni rtsa ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2213E:194a-23: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs kun //
T02TD2213E:194a-24: sgron mes gsal phyir sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD2213E:194a-25: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la gus btud de //
T02TD2213E:194a-28: sems pa'i bag chags kyis skye ba gcig nas gcig tu len pa'i phyir 'gro ba'o //
T02TD2213E:194a-29: sems can ni nyon mongs pa'i yid can te /
T02TD2213E:194a-30: kun gzhi rnam par shes ba can skye 'jig gi chos can no //
T02TD2213E:194a-31: mun pa ni rdul dang mun pa snying stobs la sogs te /
T02TD2213E:194b-0: mthong bas spang ba'i nyon @194b mongs pa /
T02TD2213E:194b-1: bsgom pas spang ba'i nyon mongs pas kun nas dkris te bcings pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-2: mthong ba ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu mi shes ba ste ma rig pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-3: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs ni /
T02TD2213E:194b-4: dang po nas sgo kun nas shes pa la /
T02TD2213E:194b-5: rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis dkris pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-6: sgron mes gsal ba'i phyir ni /
T02TD2213E:194b-7: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gsang sngags 'di nyid de /
T02TD2213E:194b-8: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa la sogs pa zag pa zad pa ni gsal bar bstan pa'i sgron ma'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-9: sgrub pa'i thabs pa'i thabs ni 'grub pa dang grub par byed pa ste don thob pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-10: dpal ldan ni yon tan rnam pa gnyis te rgyu dang 'bras bu las grub cing thob pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-11: rdo rje ni don rtags mtshon pa gsum ste /
T02TD2213E:194b-12: stong pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
T02TD2213E:194b-13: de'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gnas pa ni 'dzin cing 'chang pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-14: btud pa ni gzhung bkra shis shing mdzes pa dang 'jug pa ste /
T02TD2213E:194b-15: lus ngag yid kyi yon tan gsum dang ldan pa'i yi dam lha la dad pas 'dud ces so //
T02TD2213E:194b-16: bla ma brgyud pa'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2213E:194b-17: klu yi byang chub nyid kyis rim bzhin bshad //
T02TD2213E:194b-18: ces pa ni blo gros rin chen la sogs la sogs kyi man ngag gi rim pa'i don rnams bshad par bya zhes so //
T02TD2213E:194b-19: rigs rnams 'os su grub pa yi //
T02TD2213E:194b-20: sngags pa yon tan kun ldan pas //
T02TD2213E:194b-21: zhes pa rigs rnams ni rin po che'i rigs kyi gang zag go //
T02TD2213E:194b-22: 'os su grub pa ni dad pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-23: sngags pa ni don bzhi shes pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-24: yon tan kun ldan pa ni /
T02TD2213E:194b-25: mnor bar dbang rnams thob cing dam tshig sdom pa dang ldan te lam gnyis shes pa'o //
T02TD2213E:194b-26: yid 'ong bkra shis bde gnas su //
T02TD2213E:194b-27: zhes pa ni yid 'ong bkra shis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas bkra shis pa ste /
T02TD2213E:194b-28: byang skyob shar ri dma' ba lho gzhol nub dgye ba ste /
T02TD2213E:194b-29: mdun nas phyogs sngo ba dang /
T02TD2213E:194b-31: 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad pa //
T02TD2213E:194b-32: de yi gnas su legs 'dug ste //
T02TD2213E:194b-33: yang na tshogs tsam sogs pa la //
T02TD2213E:194b-34: nyams dga'i sa phyogs bde gnas so //
T02TD2213E:194b-35: bla med rgyu ru rab gnas na //
T02TD2213E:195a-0: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag @195a * //
T02TD2213E:195a-3: bla med rgyud rab gnas ni thog mar sems bskyed gnyis dang 'brel ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-4: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag ste ni /
T02TD2213E:195a-5: nang gi khrus nam mkha' lta bu dang /
T02TD2213E:195a-6: h'um las rang 'dod pa'i lha ru grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-7: de la snying gar nyi ma'i steng du h'um gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-8: byin brlabs bltas te bka' bsgo la //
T02TD2213E:195a-9: 'od kyis bgegs la thog rnams dbab //
T02TD2213E:195a-10: bhr'um gyi tshig dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2213E:195a-11: zhes pa la byin brlabs ni /
T02TD2213E:195a-12: snying ga spyi bo mgrin par bsgom pa ye shes bstim pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-13: ltas de ni thugs rje dang ldan pa'i sngags mig gis phyogs kun du blta zhes so ;
T02TD2213E:195a-15: rgyug zhig ma 'dug shig /'dir mthu ldan gyi khang pa yin no zhes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-16: 'od kyi bgegs la thog rnams dbab ni sa sbyong ba rnams la sa bon gyi 'od dkyil 'khor la phog ste /
T02TD2213E:195a-17: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thog lnga dbab pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-18: bhrum gyi tshig dang yang dag ldan ni //
T02TD2213E:195a-19: tsakra aom bh'um h'um sva bh'um ha bh'um aa bh'um /
T02TD2213E:195a-20: thog la yang nas yang du phab ste bsgral ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195a-22: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang //
T02TD2213E:195a-23: me yi khang pa yongs su dbu ba //
T02TD2213E:195a-25: dzva la ram yang yongs su brjod //
T02TD2213E:195a-26: ces pa h'um las 'od zer ni rang gi nyi ma 'bar ba'i h'um las 'od zer la ha ljang gu kha dog sna tshogs pa phyogs bcur 'phros te /
T02TD2213E:195a-27: rdo rje khang pa phyogs mtshams su kha dog dkar po la sogs pa ldar gyur te /
T02TD2213E:195a-29: 'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i khyad lo'i khang pa drug pa ste /
T02TD2213E:195a-30: aom badzra tsakra h'um h'um zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:195a-31: ral gri ni mda' dang mtshon cha'i khang pa ste /
T02TD2213E:195a-32: badzra na ha na zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:195a-33: me yi khang pa yongs su dbu ba ni /
T02TD2213E:195a-34: me'i khang pa shin tu thams par grub pa badzra dzva lar zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02TD2213E:195a-35: g-yas pa'i ram dang g-yon pa'i aa //
T02TD2213E:195a-38: bsrung ba grub nas bgegs gsos pa ma gsos na snying rje dang bral ba yin pa phyir /
T02TD2213E:195a-39: g-yas pa'i ram dang ni mig g-yas pa'i rab rib kyi sdig pa bsregs te snying rje dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:195b-0: g-yon pa'i aa ni g-yon pa'i aas kun gzhi gsos te @195b gsod pa'i dogs pa dang bcas pas bros te byer ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-1: bgegs gsos 'byer bar 'gyur zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02TD2213E:195b-2: rgyud 'os gyur gyur nas rang byung gi / de 'od las byung nyid dkyil du //
T02TD2213E:195b-3: slob dpon sangs rgyas bcas spyan drangs //
T02TD2213E:195b-4: blang ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin la //
T02TD2213E:195b-5: zhes pa rgyud 'os gyur nas ni nyi ma'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros te ma lus pa'i sems can la bsdu ba bzhi'am mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis don byas ye shes pa'i thugs kar thim /
T02TD2213E:195b-6: de nyid drangs te rgyud la phog pas sgrib pa rnams dag pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-7: dper na shel gyi kha dog dangs pa lta bur gyur pa'o ;
T02TD2213E:195b-8: / rang byung gi ni gdan thog tu h'um srog gi tshul du gnas pa de'i //
T02TD2213E:195b-9: de 'od las byung ni sa bon las 'od 'phros te /
T02TD2213E:195b-10: slob dpon sangs rgyas dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD2213E:195b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang spyan dangs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-12: de rnams la nyid dkyil du zhes pas gdan nyi ma padma dang seng ge rnams la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-13: bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin la ni 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus mi bskyod pa'i rnam par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-14: phyag 'tshal phyi nang bzhi yis mchod //
T02TD2213E:195b-15: sdig pa bshags nas sdom pa bzung //
T02TD2213E:195b-16: yi rang bskul dang gsol gdab pa //
T02TD2213E:195b-17: bsdo dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de //
T02TD2213E:195b-19: phyag 'tshal ni gsum ka tshogs pa'i pa'am //
T02TD2213E:195b-21: phyi nang bzhi yis mchod pa ni //
T02TD2213E:195b-22: phyi ni rdza sa dang lha mo dang //
T02TD2213E:195b-23: dbul ba'i gnas tha dad du mchod pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-24: nang gi lha mo rnams kyi rang gi rdzas rang rang gcig tu nges pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-25: gsad ba ni lha mo'i mchod pa gsang bas mnyes pas gsang ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-26: de gsum ka phyag rgya chen por rtogs pa ni bla na med pa'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-27: rdog pa bshags ni gsum la gsum gyis gsum po so so rang rang gu du mi 'chab cing 'gyod pa dang bcas pas bshags shing dam 'cha' ba'o //
T02TD2213E:195b-28: de nas rgyud dag pa'i rjes na sdom pa bzung ba ni spyi dang khyad par te blangs pa'i don las phyir 'da' ba ste rigs drug gi sdom pa la sogs pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:195b-29: yi rang ni spyi dang khyad par te bla na med pa'i lam las lhag pa gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2213E:196a-0: khyad par gyi don bskul ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo @196a * //
T02TD2213E:196a-1: bskor ba ste spyi dang bye brag go //
T02TD2213E:196a-2: gsol ba gdab pa ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mi mnga' yang gdul bya'i don du snang ste /
T02TD2213E:196a-3: de'i don du gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-4: bsngo dang ni 'bras bu khyad par can du bya'i phyir bsngo ba ste /
T02TD2213E:196a-5: byang chub tu yan lag bdun pa bsngo ba'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-6: skyabs 'gro ni phyi'i lha yongs su bcad de khyad par 'phags pa gos sngon po can la bdag nyid 'dud cing skyabs zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2213E:196a-7: sems bskyed ni gnyi ga'i stobs kyis 'khor ba las grol te lam bskyod la 'bras bu byang chub thob par byed pa'i blo can no //
T02TD2213E:196a-8: de ni lam khyad par can du sbyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2213E:196a-9: ste zhes pa lhag pa'i don te /
T02TD2213E:196a-10: bsod nams kyi tshogs der ma zad de tshad med pa yang yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-11: de rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'grub par byed pa'i rgyu'i don no //
T02TD2213E:196a-12: tshad med bzhi po yongs su bskyed //
T02TD2213E:196a-14: byams nga snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi rim pas bsgom pa ste yul la tshad med pa'i phyir dge ba la tshad med pa'i sbrul ba'i sku'i nus pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-15: rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams pa kun //
T02TD2213E:196a-16: thams cad yongs su dag pa las //
T02TD2213E:196a-17: zhes pa ni mos pa'am sh'u n+ya t'a'i sngags kyi stobs kyi rgyu dang nang sems can dang ;
T02TD2213E:196a-18: mi rgyu phyi smod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa kun /
T02TD2213E:196a-19: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad yongs su dag pa stong par grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-20: sbos pa dang bral bas chos ku'i rgyu'i don no //
T02TD2213E:196a-21: rgyu gsum dang tshogs gnyis las 'brus bu 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-22: las ni rgyu mtshan gyi don te /
T02TD2213E:196a-23: tshogs gnyis tshogs pa las 'byung zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2213E:196a-25: gzhal yas lam ldan rab tu bcas //
T02TD2213E:196a-26: grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2213E:196a-27: ka ba brgyad dang rin chen mdzes //
T02TD2213E:196a-28: dra ba dra phyed pha gu dang //
T02TD2213E:196a-29: dar dpyangs rta babs rnams dang ldan //
T02TD2213E:196a-30: zhes pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba la sogs pa blo'i bye brag gis dag pa stong pa ste grub pa de gcig tu'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-31: tha ma'i blo la dang po yod pa'i blo brtan pa'i khang pa gong gi rkyen gyis mi g-yo ste gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196a-32: rang byung ni stong pa'i ngang las so //
T02TD2213E:196a-33: sngags bskyed ni lam ldan zhes te /
T02TD2213E:196b-1: gang 'byung ba ste 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rlung chu gsar gyis gzhi dang /
T02TD2213E:196b-2: lhun po rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin //
T02TD2213E:196b-3: gzhal yas lam ldan rab tu bcas ni /
T02TD2213E:196b-4: de steng bh'um las gzhal yas khang pa rin po che lnga las grub pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-5: gru bzhi ba tshad med bzhi dang ldan /
T02TD2213E:196b-6: sgo bzhi pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang ldan //
T02TD2213E:196b-7: ka ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan /
T02TD2213E:196b-8: rin chen ni rin po che lnga las grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2213E:196b-9: mdzes 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mchod pas mdzes pa ste /
T02TD2213E:196b-11: / dra ba shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-12: dra phyed nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-13: pha gu ldan te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-14: dar dbyangs ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02TD2213E:196b-15: rta babs ni phyogs kyi rtag babs bzhi yang dag par spangs pa bzhi rnams dang ldan ni phyi nang gi rgyan rnams tshogs par grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-16: dur khrod brgyad kyi nye bar grub pa ste /
T02TD2213E:196b-17: dur khrod brgyad ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam mtshon pa'i don to //
T02TD2213E:196b-18: shing dang mchod rten dang lha dang klu dang srin dang /
T02TD2213E:196b-19: phyogs kyi bdag po rnams dang ce sbyang dang /
T02TD2213E:196b-21: ro gsar rnying gi rnam par rtog pa dang rgyu ba med pa'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-22: seng ge 'khor lo zla ba'i gdan //
T02TD2213E:196b-25: nyi zla padma ro yi gdan //
T02TD2213E:196b-26: nyon mongs mgo bo gnon pa dang //
T02TD2213E:196b-27: rnam kun ma lus gcod pa dang //
T02TD2213E:196b-28: thabs dang shes rab zung du ldan //
T02TD2213E:196b-29: nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa //
T02TD2213E:196b-30: rnam rtog thams cad rab tu bcom //
T02TD2213E:196b-31: de steng h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD2213E:196b-32: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag / nyon mongs kun sel gtum po'i gzugs //
T02TD2213E:196b-34: de steng gi gdan de rnams kyi thog tu'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-35: h'um las zhes pa 'od zer gyis las gnyis byas te /
T02TD2213E:196b-37: yang gnyis kyi las byas te /
T02TD2213E:196b-38: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag ni //
T02TD2213E:196b-39: mchog thun mong gi bdag por snang ba'o //
T02TD2213E:196b-40: nyon mongs kun sel ni mthong bas spang ba dang bsgom pas spang ba rnams so //
T02TD2213E:197a-2: spang bya phyir rgol ba rnams la gtum po'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-3: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan //
T02TD2213E:197a-4: mthing ga gos sngon sku la gsol //
T02TD2213E:197a-5: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
T02TD2213E:197a-6: thun mong las dang rjes mthun no //
T02TD2213E:197a-7: mchog kyang thogs pa med par ro //
T02TD2213E:197a-8: sbrul bzhis lus la rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2213E:197a-9: spyan dmar mche gtsigs sbrul nag za //
T02TD2213E:197a-10: rin chen dpa' bo'i chos kyis brgyan //
T02TD2213E:197a-11: brkyang bsku ma khro bo brjid pa'i zhal //
T02TD2213E:197a-12: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa can //
T02TD2213E:197a-14: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan pa ni phung lnga dag pas rigs lnga de ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-15: mthing gar gnas pa ni don stong pa nyid la 'gyur ba med pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-16: gos sngon sku la gsol ba ni rigs 'dzin pa ste dar ljang gu'i kha chag can no //
T02TD2213E:197a-17: rdo rje ni lag g-yas na thogs te thabs kyi rang bzhin rtse lnga la khyud lnga dang sa bon bkod pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-18: g-yon dril bu thogs te shes rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD2213E:197a-19: thun mong las dang rjes mthun ni /
T02TD2213E:197a-20: thun mong gtso bor bsgrub pa la phyag mtshan gdul bya'i dbang gi skabs dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2213E:197a-21: mchog kyang thogs pa med par ro ni /
T02TD2213E:197a-22: mchog gtsor sgrub pa la zung du 'brel pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2213E:197a-23: sbrul bzhis lus la rnam par brgyan ni //
T02TD2213E:197a-24: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs rigs rnams //
T02TD2213E:197a-25: kha dog ser po dmar po dkar po dang //
T02TD2213E:197a-26: nag po zhabs grub la sogs byas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-27: spyan dmar ba ni sems can la thugs rjes chags pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-28: che ba gtsigs pa ni bdud bzhi dang sdang ba 'dul ba ste don byed pa'i rtags sbrul nag za ba ni nyon mongs pa'i gzug pa mjoms ['joms] pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-29: rin chen dpa' bo'i chos kyis brgyan ni //
T02TD2213E:197a-30: rin po che'i rgyan dang dpa' bo'i chas kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-31: brkyang bsku ma ni don gnyis mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-32: khro bo brjid pa'i zhal ni khro chags gnyis kyi tshul gyis don mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-33: gsum khyim che ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab pa'i don no //
T02TD2213E:197a-34: 'jigs pa can ni gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197a-35: de gsal mdun du ye shes dgug //
T02TD2213E:197a-36: bgegs bsal mchod dang gtor mas mnyes /
T02TD2213E:197b-0: de gsal mdun du ni @197b dam tshig pa rags pa dang phra ba gsal ba'i mdun du ye shes pa dgug ste h'um gi 'od kyis 'og min gyi gnas nas ye shes pa'i lha rnams dgug ces pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-1: badzra sa manta dza: zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:197b-2: bgegs bsal ni ye shes pa dang lhan cig pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad pa ste ;
T02TD2213E:197b-3: aom badzra yaksha h'um phat ces pas 'byer bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-4: phyin ci log gi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir gsung gi tha snyad tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2213E:197b-7: mchod dang gtor mas mnyes ni phyag sngon du byas te dngos sam mchod pa yid kyis dbul pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-8: gzhan yang mchod pas mnyes par bya ba'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-9: de nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2213E:197b-10: ae ma ho dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2213E:197b-11: lus kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2213E:197b-12: ye shes thugs rje chen po'i ngang //
T02TD2213E:197b-13: bdag lus ye shes kur byin rlobs //
T02TD2213E:197b-15: tshig gnyis su dag dang yid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-16: de nas sku gsung thugs gnas su //
T02TD2213E:197b-19: bsdus shing bsregs te sbyong ba las //
T02TD2213E:197b-20: ye shes gsum ni gnas su gnas //
T02TD2213E:197b-21: zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i rjes de nas sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su yig 'bru gsum ste //
T02TD2213E:197b-23: de gsum las 'od byung nas mi sdug ste lus kyi sngom mam sdig pa'i gzugs su yig 'bru dag gi kam nag por yid kyis gzugs te /
T02TD2213E:197b-24: yid kyi 'od dpung nag po'i gzugs su snying gar bsdu'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-25: de rnams snying gar bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-26: spyi bor sbyar te bskur ba'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-27: 'od zer gyi rtsal gyi la so //
T02TD2213E:197b-28: gnas gsum du rigs kyi lha gsum grub ste /
T02TD2213E:197b-29: de yang ye shes gsum ni gnas su ste /
T02TD2213E:197b-30: rang grang gi rigs la ye shes pa'i lha ba bstims pa'o //
T02TD2213E:197b-31: ye shes rigs lngas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2213E:197b-32: dbang bskur mi bskyod rigs lngas brgyan //
T02TD2213E:197b-33: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya aa bhi shi nytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dag yongs su dag par byas te zhes pa ni /
T02TD2213E:197b-34: bla mas rig sngags gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2213E:197b-35: ye shes rig sngags byin brlabs te //
T02TD2213E:198a-0: dbang bskur gsol ba gdab pa @198a * //
T02TD2213E:198a-2: / aom la sogs pa brjod pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-3: dbang bskur zhes ni gsungs pa ste //
T02TD2213E:198a-4: rigs lnga shar nas chu yi dbang //
T02TD2213E:198a-5: zhe sdang rnam par sel ba dang //
T02TD2213E:198a-6: me long ye shes rgyud la gnas //
T02TD2213E:198a-7: lho nas dbu rgyan dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2213E:198a-8: ser sna rnam par sel ba dang //
T02TD2213E:198a-9: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gnas //
T02TD2213E:198a-10: nub nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2213E:198a-11: 'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang //
T02TD2213E:198a-12: so so thar pa'i ye shes gnas //
T02TD2213E:198a-13: byang nas dril bu'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2213E:198a-14: phrag dog sgrib pa sel pa dang //
T02TD2213E:198a-15: bya ba nan tan ye shes gnas //
T02TD2213E:198a-16: dbus su ming gi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2213E:198a-17: ma rig mun pa sel ba dang //
T02TD2213E:198a-18: chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-19: de la rtags dang rgyas gdab ni //
T02TD2213E:198a-20: mi bskyod rigs lngas brgyan pa ste //
T02TD2213E:198a-21: mi bskyod gtso bor gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-22: lus kyi dri ma rnam par sbyang //
T02TD2213E:198a-23: dag yongs su dag par bya ste zhes pa /
T02TD2213E:198a-24: gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu blang //
T02TD2213E:198a-25: rigs lnga yab yum snyoms par zhugs //
T02TD2213E:198a-26: thugs rje chen po'i rang du zhu //
T02TD2213E:198a-27: thig le a'a: dang h'um rnams la //
T02TD2213E:198a-28: aa bhi shi nytsas sbyin par bya //
T02TD2213E:198a-29: aa ho su khas lces blangs la //
T02TD2213E:198a-30: dag las gyur pa'i dri ma rnams //
T02TD2213E:198a-31: thams cad dag ste nus mthu can //
T02TD2213E:198a-32: dbyangs dang rdo rjer gyur pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-33: thun mong gtso bo gnyis pos grub //
T02TD2213E:198a-34: gzhan rnams mos pa tsam nyid do //
T02TD2213E:198a-35: mchog la rdzogs par blang bar gsungs //
T02TD2213E:198a-36: sems ni yongs su dag bya ste //
T02TD2213E:198a-37: don gyis gnas par shes par bya //
T02TD2213E:198a-38: lha mo 'di yang mtshan nyid ldan //
T02TD2213E:198a-39: lag pas bzung ste gsol ba btab //
T02TD2213E:198a-40: dag pa bzhi yi dbye ba las //
T02TD2213E:198a-41: gnyis med ye shes gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-42: de nas yan lag drug gis bskyed //
T02TD2213E:198a-43: bzhi pa phyag rgya chen por gnas //
T02TD2213E:198a-44: gsang sngags bzlas so zhes pas dbang gi rjes de nas sngags bzlas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-45: gsal ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra //
T02TD2213E:198a-46: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa la gsal bar byed pa de nyid do zhes pa ni /
T02TD2213E:198a-47: gsal ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra na rags pa gsal ba gtso bo gsal ba ste sku mdog dang rgyan chags la ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198a-48: phra ba gsal ba ni sems dpa' sum brtsegs gsal ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-0: bdag @198b ni bdag lhar gsal ba /
T02TD2213E:198b-1: gzhan gyi rnam pa ni gzhal yas khang dang bsrung ba gsal ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-2: gsal bar bsgom pa de nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2213E:198b-3: rgyud rnams sbyong ba'i bzlas pa ni //
T02TD2213E:198b-4: rags pa dang ni phra ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-5: rangs pa gnyis te ba thag dang //
T02TD2213E:198b-6: ba thag med do gnyis ka la //
T02TD2213E:198b-7: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'i tshul //
T02TD2213E:198b-8: phra ba'ang gsum du byung ba ni //
T02TD2213E:198b-9: h'um bskul sreg pa ram yin te //
T02TD2213E:198b-10: lte bar bskur ba spyi bo aa //
T02TD2213E:198b-12: dri ma sbyong ba'i bzlas pa la //
T02TD2213E:198b-13: rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste //
T02TD2213E:198b-14: rags pa dus mnyam gdon la sogs //
T02TD2213E:198b-15: phra ba rim pas bya ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-16: rags pa la zlos lugs gnyis te //
T02TD2213E:198b-17: ba thag yod pa ni lus ngag yid kyi skud pa 'brel pa'i tshul du dus mnyam du snying ga nas sngom mam sdig ba'am yi ge 'od dpung du 'don pa ste /
T02TD2213E:198b-18: sarba pa'i bam au tsa ta ya zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:198b-19: de rnams ma lus lte bar ram la sems bsreg te /
T02TD2213E:198b-20: da ha dzva la ram zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2213E:198b-21: thal ba ma lus pa spyi bo nas ham dkar pos chu rgyun phab ste /
T02TD2213E:198b-22: sarba b'a bam shuddho& am tsa ta ya zhes pa dang 'phrel to //
T02TD2213E:198b-23: ba thag med pa ni 'od kyi skud pa sbrel ba ma yin te /
T02TD2213E:198b-24: 'od zer gyis lus dag yid kyi las dang pa rnams 'byed pa ste /
T02TD2213E:198b-25: nor bu chu 'thung ba bzhin no ;
T02TD2213E:198b-26: / gnyi ga la ste rags pa dang phra ba gnyis ga la tshul 'di nyid de mgal la bar mchad pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-27: phreng ba yig 'bru la 'od zer gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-28: nyi ma ni 'od zer lus yongs la khyab pa'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-29: phra ba'ang gsum du byung ba ni dus mnyam yin te re mos rim gyis gsum 'byung ba'o ;
T02TD2213E:198b-30: / h'um bskul sreg pa ram yin te /
T02TD2213E:198b-31: lte ba bkur ba spyi bo aa ni lus kyi snying gnas sngom gyi gzugs su bton /
T02TD2213E:198b-32: lte bar ram las bsreg spyi bo aas brku ba'o //
T02TD2213E:198b-33: ngag gi kam nag po ru yid kyi 'od dbung du gdon pa dang sreg pa dang bkru ba rim gyis so //
T02TD2213E:198b-34: mtshan ma 'dod pa'i bzlas pa la //
T02TD2213E:198b-35: rnam pa lngar ni 'dir ma byas //
T02TD2213E:198b-37: mtshan ma bsnyen pa skyel pa'i bzlas pa la //
T02TD2213E:198b-38: gzhan dag na rnam par lngar bshad pa yod de /
T02TD2213E:198b-40: snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung //
T02TD2213E:198b-41: ba thag gzings dang dmigs pa med //
T02TD2213E:199a-2: ram dang h'um las me byung bas //
T02TD2213E:199a-3: zhes pas khyad par gyi don te //
T02TD2213E:199a-5: bsnyen pa ni snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung zhes ba'i don te /
T02TD2213E:199a-6: grangs kyis bsnyen pa skyel 'dod na //
T02TD2213E:199a-7: 'bum tsho gcig dang gnyis dang gsum ;
T02TD2213E:199a-8: / gsum dang bdun dang bye ba'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-9: snyigs ma'i dus su nyi shu ste //
T02TD2213E:199a-10: gsum la re re spyi ru gcig / de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-11: rtsa ba'i sngags la gtso bor bskyal //
T02TD2213E:199a-12: snying nang ye shes sems dpa'i yi //
T02TD2213E:199a-13: rdo rje h'um las bskor ba ste //
T02TD2213E:199a-14: mgal me breng nga nyi ma'i tshul //
T02TD2213E:199a-17: ba thag gzings dang dmigs pa med ces pa'i don te /
T02TD2213E:199a-18: thugs ka'i h'um las 'od zer 'og man du ye shes pa la phog ste mchod pas tshur 'dus te ye shes kyi byin rlabs bstim pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-19: aom badzra tsan ta ma h'a ao sha na h'um phat /
T02TD2213E:199a-20: aom r'a dza ma h'a ga ru da h'um h'um h'um 'di rnams bzlas pa'i don te /
T02TD2213E:199a-23: zhes pa ni bsgrub pa'i las ston pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-24: sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te dgug la ye shes pa la 'od zer gyis mchod nas mnyes te /
T02TD2213E:199a-25: de nas 'od zer gnyis byung bas las ngan pa dang sgrib pa dang nus mthu rnams dmar pos bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-26: nyi ma rnams dkar pos 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-27: sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'byin pa'i sngags dang bcu gcig pa dang lnga pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-28: 'di yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-29: da ni sgrub pa chen po las brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2213E:199a-30: ram dang h'um las me byung bas zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2213E:199a-31: sems dpa' sum brtsegs kyi rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um dmar nag dang /
T02TD2213E:199a-32: lte ba'i ram las me 'bar te /
T02TD2213E:199a-33: sor gcig gam gnyis sam khur gang la sogs pa 'phros te /
T02TD2213E:199a-34: mi shin tu drag cing rtsub pa myur ba che ba'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD2213E:199a-35: de rnams smin gyi lus bag chags ngan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi yid bgegs kyi gdon sems nus mthu las kyi sgrib pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199a-36: 'od 'og min du 'phros pas bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje me'i phung por 'dus nas /
T02TD2213E:199a-37: de rnams me gnyis bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-0: sngags bzlas pas @199b kyang me'i rang bzhin du byung ste bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-1: ngag gi sngags bzlas pa yang /
T02TD2213E:199b-2: gzung ring gtso bor bya ste /
T02TD2213E:199b-3: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'u phat /
T02TD2213E:199b-4: ka sta stam gu li tsa la na sarba be tsa a'a ma dza n'a n'a ga m'a ra ya phat /
T02TD2213E:199b-5: ha pa aom pa khri aom r'a dza ma h'a ga ru da h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2213E:199b-6: yang na zlos pa dang skor bzlog tu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-7: de ltar bsregs te rnam par byang ba'i sems nyid las /
T02TD2213E:199b-8: ye shes lus su gsal bar snang //
T02TD2213E:199b-10: gtso bo dang phyag g-yon pa'i bya khyung dang gnyis tha mi dang pa lha'i ngo bo me'i rnam par grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-11: thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes la /
T02TD2213E:199b-12: lha dang sngags 'di rnams kyis ngan song las sgrol bar 'gyur /
T02TD2213E:199b-13: nad kyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur /
T02TD2213E:199b-14: gnod pa'i bgegs la 'chi snyam pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung /
T02TD2213E:199b-15: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2213E:199b-16: sngags rnams kyi gzhan du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar gyur cig sv'a h'a h'um phat ces btags shing sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-17: de ni mtshan ma 'dod pa'o 'byung ste /
T02TD2213E:199b-18: grub rtags thon pa'i rtags gsum las //
T02TD2213E:199b-19: 'od sgra sku ston sgyu ma dang //
T02TD2213E:199b-20: zhes pa ni rtags rnam pa gsum 'byung ste /
T02TD2213E:199b-21: lha grub pa gos sngon po gon ba me tog sngon po thu ba nyi zla'i steng na 'dug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-22: sdig pa dang nad thon rtags ni lus las mi gtsang ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2213E:199b-23: rnag khrag la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-24: rtags gsum pa ni sdig sbrul la sogs bsreg cing 'tshod pa'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-25: dngos su 'byung ba'i mtshan ma ni 'od kyi phung po'am /
T02TD2213E:199b-29: lha'i sgra'am chos ston pa'i sgra'o //
T02TD2213E:199b-30: sprul ba la sku gcig gi zhal mthong ba'am /
T02TD2213E:199b-32: dpag tu med pa'i zhal mthong ba 'byung ste /
T02TD2213E:199b-33: tha ma dang 'bring dang rab tu 'byung ba'o ;
T02TD2213E:199b-34: / de lta bu'i rnam pa byung yang /
T02TD2213E:199b-35: bden pa'i dngos por gang yang grub pa med de /
T02TD2213E:199b-36: gang zhig yod par rtog pa yang //
T02TD2213E:199b-37: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD2213E:199b-38: gang zhig med par rtog pa yang //
T02TD2213E:199b-39: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD2213E:199b-40: gang zhig gnyi gar rtog pa yang//
T02TD2213E:200a-0: @200a * // 'di las sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD2213E:200a-1: rtogs dang brtags par bya ba dag / gnyis su bzung na bdud kyi las //
T02TD2213E:200a-2: rnam par snang ba sems nyid de //
T02TD2213E:200a-3: gang du yang ni grub pa med //
T02TD2213E:200a-5: de tshe gnyis dang ldan nam mi ldan yang rung ste bsod nams kyi las tshogs dang gtor ma la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-6: dga' ba'am mi dga' ba'i sems sgyu ma'i blos bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-7: de rjes sangs rgyas lung ston 'byung //
T02TD2213E:200a-9: de la mkha' 'gro rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par byed do //
T02TD2213E:200a-10: sbrul pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas mang pos lung ston to //
T02TD2213E:200a-11: zhing khams 'di zhes bya bar 'khor dang gdul bya dang bstan pa 'di srid gnas so zhes ton par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2213E:200a-12: grogs ni khrus dang sreg dang tshe //
T02TD2213E:200a-14: tshogs dang sbyin sreg gsad pa dang //
T02TD2213E:200a-15: tsha tsha gtor ma la sogs pa //
T02TD2213E:200a-17: de nas gser la sogs pa 'grub //
T02TD2213E:200a-18: ces pa ni bskyed rdzogs kyi grogs bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2213E:200a-19: khrus ni phyi dang nang ngo //
T02TD2213E:200a-21: rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
T02TD2213E:200a-22: thams cad sel par byed do //
T02TD2213E:200a-23: sred pa ni nang gi sbyin sreg ting nge 'dzin gyis sdig pa bsreg pa ste grogs so //
T02TD2213E:200a-24: tshe ni phyi'i tshe bsring ba'i las kun bya ba dang //
T02TD2213E:200a-25: nor spel ba lha rnams thos bu brten te spel ba'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-26: nang gi tshe rin po che'i ga'u'i nang du gnas bcas te brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-27: bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang 'brel pa ste /
T02TD2213E:200a-29: klog 'don ni bka'i rgyun 'brum kha thon nam glegs bam la tshul bzhin du klog / kun chub par byed yid la byed pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-30: mandala ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la dbul pa'i rin pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-31: tshogs ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD2213E:200a-33: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i ston mo bya'o //
T02TD2213E:200a-34: sbyin sreg ni phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg ste dngos grub bzhi sbyin sreg go //
T02TD2213E:200a-35: gsad par byed pa'i rgyu gsan pa'i //
T02TD2213E:200b-0: bla ma dang dkon mchog gi sku dgra rnams mngon spyod kyi las brtsams pas te snying rje'i @200b bsam pa dang ldan pas gsad pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-1: tsha tsha ni sku gsung thugs kyi rten pa bzhengs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-2: gtor ma ni phyi nang du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-3: sogs pa'i don ni las bcu dang bsod nams kyi las so //
T02TD2213E:200b-4: 'di yang grogs su 'gro ba yin te /
T02TD2213E:200b-5: dngos grub gnyis thob par byed la gtso bo ma yin yang 'di rnams bskyed du 'gyur te /
T02TD2213E:200b-6: nyams su blang ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-7: de rnams ldan na gser la sogs pa 'grub ste /
T02TD2213E:200b-8: thun mong gi dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo //
T02TD2213E:200b-9: yum lcang lo can gyi rgyud las /
T02TD2213E:200b-10: ri lu rkang myongs mig sman dang //
T02TD2213E:200b-11: gter dang dgra bo tshar gcod dang //
T02TD2213E:200b-12: gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len //
T02TD2213E:200b-13: ral gri 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad //
T02TD2213E:200b-14: bzlas pa tshogs dang gro mas 'grub //
T02TD2213E:200b-16: mchod 'dod pa yi sems can gyis //
T02TD2213E:200b-17: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ston pa yin te /
T02TD2213E:200b-18: mchod 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-19: sems can ni rigs dang ldan pa gang zag de gtso bor grub pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-20: thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo dang //
T02TD2213E:200b-21: snying nang sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa //
T02TD2213E:200b-22: thig le thig le yi ges mtshan //
T02TD2213E:200b-23: dbus su thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02TD2213E:200b-24: thig le ye shes gsal bar 'bar //
T02TD2213E:200b-26: thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo bzhi ni spyir bor mgrin snying lte ba bzhi /
T02TD2213E:200b-28: 'og ma gnyis po shes rab ste //
T02TD2213E:200b-29: gong ma thabs su yang dag bshad //
T02TD2213E:200b-30: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus gnas te //
T02TD2213E:200b-31: la la n'a dang ras n'a //
T02TD2213E:200b-32: g-yas dang g-yon du gnas ba'o ;
T02TD2213E:200b-33: / snying po'i tshul du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-34: rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02TD2213E:200b-35: bcu drug pa dang de yi phyed //
T02TD2213E:200b-36: drug cu rim gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-37: theg li thig le yang dag mtshan ni 'khor lo dbye ba de rnams la /
T02TD2213E:200b-38: a'a li nyis 'gyur rkyang pa dang //
T02TD2213E:200b-39: sde tshan brgyad du yang dag gnas ;
T02TD2213E:200b-40: / k'a li nyis 'gyur rnam dbyes mtshan //
T02TD2213E:200b-41: g-yas pa'i rtsa na a'a li ste //
T02TD2213E:200b-42: g-yon pa nyid na k'a li'o //
T02TD2213E:200b-43: thig le 'khyags pa'i tshul du gnas //
T02TD2213E:200b-44: snying dbus su thabs dang shes rab 'bar ni /
T02TD2213E:200b-45: snying nang nyi zla'i bar du ni //
T02TD2213E:201a-0: a'a li thig le ye shes gsal bar bsams ni ham @201a * //
T02TD2213E:201a-1: a'a:aom h'um gi yi ge ni //
T02TD2213E:201a-2: thig le'i tshul du gnas pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201a-3: thig le gsal ba ye shes rgyu //
T02TD2213E:201a-4: de la ye shes brtags pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201a-5: au ma dbyings nas sprul pa ru //
T02TD2213E:201a-6: ye shes gsal ba dbyings la thug / de tshe mi gnas bsam dang bral //
T02TD2213E:201a-8: dbu ma dbyings nas sprul pa ru //
T02TD2213E:201a-9: 'og gi lam gyi gnas su ni //
T02TD2213E:201a-10: rlung sngon kha dog rnam lnga bskyed //
T02TD2213E:201a-11: gtum mo'i me ni rab tu bus //
T02TD2213E:201a-12: rtsa gsum nang na yar la zhugs //
T02TD2213E:201a-14: gsal zhing zhu bas bde chen 'byung //
T02TD2213E:201a-15: ye shes gsal ba dbyings la thug ni 'od zer tshangs pa'i gnas nas 'phros //
T02TD2213E:201a-16: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2213E:201a-17: ye shes thig le'i rnam pa bkug / gnas su zhugs nas gnyis med 'dres //
T02TD2213E:201a-18: de tshe mi gnas bsam bral 'byung //
T02TD2213E:201a-19: de ltar du ni bsgoms pa la //
T02TD2213E:201a-20: phyag rgya chen po skye ba ste //
T02TD2213E:201a-21: bsam dang rtog pa'i yul las 'das //
T02TD2213E:201a-22: tshig dang sgra yi yul las 'das //
T02TD2213E:201a-23: gang du yang ni mi gnas so //
T02TD2213E:201a-24: 'gro ba'i dbang po gang dang gang gi rtsa //
T02TD2213E:201a-25: kha phye steng du thig le bsam //
T02TD2213E:201a-28: dbang po gang dang gang gi rtsa //
T02TD2213E:201a-29: dbang po lnga po gang yang rung //
T02TD2213E:201a-30: gzugs sgra de bzhin yul rnams la //
T02TD2213E:201a-31: 'dzin par byed pa'i rtsa rnams la //
T02TD2213E:201a-33: dbang po yul dang yul can gnyis //
T02TD2213E:201a-34: de gnyis thig le stong par bsgom //
T02TD2213E:201a-35: 'od gsal me yis sbyangs pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201a-36: de ltar du ni bsam zhes gsungs //
T02TD2213E:201a-37: ba thag phug nas thig le la ;
T02TD2213E:201a-38: / thim mo de la blo gtad pas //
T02TD2213E:201a-41: ba thag ces ni 'brel pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201a-44: snang ba lam du byed pa yin //
T02TD2213E:201a-45: snang ba thig le'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2213E:201a-46: snang ba stong pa gcig tu thim ;
T02TD2213E:201a-47: / stong pa rang bzhin dngos de la //
T02TD2213E:201a-48: mi rtog pa yi blo gtad pas //
T02TD2213E:201a-49: mtha' 'das rang bzhin med pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201a-50: gang du yang ni grub pa med //
T02TD2213E:201a-51: brjod min rtog min lhan cig skyes //
T02TD2213E:201a-52: 'jug pa ba thag bzhi po yang //
T02TD2213E:201a-53: srid gsum 'joms pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2213E:201b-0: stong pa ba @201b thag bzhi por thim //
T02TD2213E:201b-3: ba thag kun du brtags pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-4: bzhi bo yang ni tha dad med //
T02TD2213E:201b-5: skye ba rmi lam sring pa gsum //
T02TD2213E:201b-6: srid gsum zhes ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2213E:201b-7: de rnams srid pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2213E:201b-8: ro mnyam gcig tu rtogs pas so //
T02TD2213E:201b-9: stong pa ba thag bzhi por thim //
T02TD2213E:201b-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas lugs la //
T02TD2213E:201b-11: 'bras bu rtog pa'i stong nyid thim //
T02TD2213E:201b-12: ma la bu ni thim pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201b-13: rtog pa thams cad bcom pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-14: dbang po thig le med pa la //
T02TD2213E:201b-15: au ma chen bo dbyings nyid du //
T02TD2213E:201b-16: ye shes phra mo las kyis spro //
T02TD2213E:201b-20: rlung rkyang pa la sgom pa ste //
T02TD2213E:201b-21: dbang po thig le med pa la rtsa dang thig le mi sgom pa rlung rkyang pa la sgom pa ste /
T02TD2213E:201b-22: rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba'i don no //
T02TD2213E:201b-23: rlung ni 'khor bar bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
T02TD2213E:201b-24: de rgyu lam du 'gro bar shes //
T02TD2213E:201b-25: rgyu lam 'bras bur rnam par bshad //
T02TD2213E:201b-26: yang dag don la dbye ba med //
T02TD2213E:201b-27: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-28: bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas yin pas dbyings so //
T02TD2213E:201b-29: ye shes rlung g-yas g-yon spro ba'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-30: 'byung ba phyir 'byung ste h'um gi ngo bo'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-31: 'jug pa rlung nang du aom gyi ngo bo 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-32: phra ba ni rtog pa rags pa stong pa ste /
T02TD2213E:201b-33: gnas pa aa skye ba med pa'i don du bsgom ste /
T02TD2213E:201b-34: rlung ba thag dang 'dra ba de la brten pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-35: thun tshod ni skor bdun la sogs te /
T02TD2213E:201b-38: dbyu gu dang thun tshad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-39: de la brten nas dngos grub 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2213E:201b-40: de la rtags 'byung ba yi don //
T02TD2213E:201b-41: rtags phyag rgya'i ye shes chen po thob par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02TD2213E:201b-42: du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer mkhar snang rtags //
T02TD2213E:201b-43: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2213E:201b-44: bde chen sku la sogs pa gnyis med 'byung //
T02TD2213E:201b-45: don rnams ma lus rdzogs par mdzad//
T02TD2213E:201b-46: 'di ni gang zag snod can las /
T02TD2213E:201b-47: shes pa bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba 'di gang zag snod can la bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2213E:201b-48: dad ldan nga rgyal med cing don la phyogs //
T02TD2213E:201b-49: brtson 'grus ldan zhing zab mo'i don la mos //
T02TD2213E:201b-50: bla ma la gus dge la rin chen rigs //
T02TD2213E:202a-2: gang zag tshul 'chos g-yo can rnams //
T02TD2213E:202a-3: gsang sngags phrag khyer dan song rgyu //
T02TD2213E:202a-4: de la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02TD2213E:202a-6: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis //
T02TD2213E:202a-7: bsgrubs na mkha' spyod la sogs pa //
T02TD2213E:202a-9: / tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i gang zag la //
T02TD2213E:202a-10: dngos grub klu mo mkha' 'gros ster //
T02TD2213E:202a-12: brgyud pa'i rim pa man ngag 'di bkod pas //
T02TD2213E:202a-13: tshig dang don la nyes pa shor srid na //
T02TD2213E:202a-14: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang //
T02TD2213E:202a-15: mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol /
T02TD2213E:202a-16: zhes gong ma rnams la bzod par gsol ba'i don te /
T02TD2213E:202a-17: blo gros rin chen la sogs bde gshegs mkha' 'gro rnams la'o //
T02TD2213E:202a-19: khengs ba rnyed pa bkur sti la sogs min //
T02TD2213E:202a-20: phyi rabs rtsod pa'i dus su sems can dngos grub 'byung //
T02TD2213E:202a-22: 'di brtsams pa yi bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2213E:202a-23: khams gsum sems can ma lus kun //
T02TD2213E:202a-24: rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa yongs spangs nas //
T02TD2213E:202a-25: yongs su dag pa'i sa thob shog / ces pa bsngo ba'i don te /
T02TD2213E:202a-26: sems can kun gyis spang bya rnams spangs nas //
T02TD2213E:202a-27: phyag rgya chen po'i sa thob par shog / ces pa'o //
T02TD2213E:202a-28: blo chung bdag gis brtsams par mi 'os te //
T02TD2213E:202a-29: dman mos sems can don gyi phyir //
T02TD2213E:202a-30: tshig dang don la nyes srid na //
T02TD2213E:202a-31: de nyid khyed rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2213E:202a-32: bdag gis 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2213E:202a-33: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun //
T02TD2213E:202a-34: de nyid don ni rab rtogs shog / bdag kyang 'gro don byed par shog / klu'i byang chub kyi sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2213E:202a-36: // / slob dpon n'a g'ardzu na zhes kyang bya /
T02TD2213E:202a-37: klu sgrub snying po zhes kyang bya /
T02TD2213E:202a-38: klu yi byang chub zhes kyang bya /
T02TD2213E:202a-39: klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
